Property.name: EnableGamma
Property.HelpText: Enable fixes to add the missing Dreamcast effects for Gamma.

Property.name: EnableTikal
Property.HelpText: Replaces Tikal's updated models with their Dreamcast counterparts.

Property.name: EnableEggman
Property.HelpText: Replaces Eggman's updated models with their Dreamcast counterparts.

Property.name: EnableCDMetalSonic
Property.HelpText: Swaps out Metal Sonic's model with the Metal Sonic model in the Mystic Ruins Eggbase.

Property.name: DisableSaturnSkyChase
Property.HelpText: When enabled, the EV models from the cutscenes involving Sky Chase are used for gameplay. Requires Dreamcast Skychase to be enabled.

Property.name: EnableExtras
Property.HelpText: Swaps out models based on upgrades. Example: Super Sonic can have normal shoes or the Crystal Ring, character's jump models feature upgrades as well.

Property.name: MetalSonicHoverBehavior
Property.HelpText: Swaps Metal Sonic's hover behavior. "Swap" for swapping the Run/Hover animations. "Always" to make Metal Sonic always hover at higher speeds.

Property.name: StretchyShoes
Property.HelpText: Controls the behavior of Sonic's stretchy shoes, only functions when Sonic's DC model is enabled. Use "LSShoeMorphs" for the addition of stretchy shoes on the Light Speed Shoes.
